TextView.android:text: Betting here is simple, all you have to do is choose the team that you think it will win and wait for the game results to come up. Usually the odds are in favor of the team who is most likely to win, lets say team A has 1,05 odd and on the other hand team B has a 6,30 odd, it's most likely that team A will win the game because their the strongest team, the minor the odd the better the team is statistically, and less money you receive from betting and winning on the team.
